type.description: Tye type of transaction (normal, unsigned, reward, invalid).

hash.description: The hex-encoded hash of the transaction.

miniblockHash.description: The hex-encoded hash of the miniblock that included this transaction.

miniblockType.description: The type of the miniblock that included this transaction (TxBlock, InvalidBlock, RewardsBlock, SmartContractResultBlock).

round.description: The round when this transaction was processed.

receiver.description: The receiver of the transaction (bech32 format).

sender.description: The sender of the transaction (bech32 format).

senderShard.description: The shard of the sender account.

destinationShard.description: The shard of the receiver account.

gasPrice.description: The applicable gas price for processing the transaction, as specified by the sender.

gasLimit.description: The maximum amount of gas to use for processing the transaction, as specified by the sender.

value.description: The amount of eGLD to be transferred.

data.description: The base64-encoded payload of the transaction.

status.description: The status of the transaction (success, fail, invalid).
